Package com.javagameengine.renderer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bindable
    Interface describing an object that contains a bind() method used for setting up the openGL context.
    Drawable
    Represents an object that contains a method draw() that draws itself into openGL based on the currently bound openGL context.
    Renderable
    Describes an object that can be rendered into openGL or affects the rendering process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OcclusionQuery
    Object encapsulating a query to the GPU for the number of samples drawn during a given set of GPU commands.
    Renderer
    Renderer is the main class that handles the rendering pipeline.
    RendererState  
    RenderPass  
    RenderQueue  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RendererState.BlendMode  
    RendererState.DepthFunc  
    RenderPass.Mode
